revision.comment: Protected "[[LibSBGN]]": protected for migration to GitGub [edit=sysop:move=sysop] [cascading]
revision.text:
= About LibSBGN =
The main goal of LibSBGN is to provide a standard electronic implementation for [[Main Page|SBGN]].
== Download ==
Please also see the [[LibSBGN/Release Notes|Release Notes]]
* [http://sourceforge.net/projects/libsbgn/files/libsbgn-milestone2.zip/download libsbgn-milestone2.zip] * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/libsbgn/files/libsbgn-milestone2.tar.gz/download libsbgn-milestone2.tar.gz]
== The SBGN-ML format ==
SBGN-ML is an XML-based file format dedicated to the description of SBGN maps.
For more information, refer to the page dedicated to this [[LibSBGN/Exchange Format|exchange format]].
== The LibSBGN library ==
LibSBGN is a library that deals with [[Main Page|SBGN maps]]. It features: * Reading / writing the SBGN-ML file format * Validation (of semantical and syntactical correctness) See [[LibSBGN/ValidationEntryPage|ValidationEntryPage]] * Conversion to other formats such as SBML and BioPAX * Support for at least Java and C++
== Current status ==
LibSBGN and SBGN-ML are still in development. See [[LibSBGN/SBGN-ML_Roadmap|SBGN-ML_Roadmap]]
= Documentation =
== General information ==
* [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/5304/version/1 LibSBGN presentation] at COMBINE 2010 * [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/4967/version/1 LibSBGN poster] presented at COMBINE 2010 and ISCB 2010 * [http://libsbgn.sourceforge.net/SBGNML_Introduction.pdf LibSBGN tutorial] presented at [http://www.co.mbine.org/events/HARMONY_2011 HARMONY 2011] * [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/6373/version/1/ LibSBGN status update] presented at [http://co.mbine.org/events/COMBINE_2011 COMBINE 2011]
== ... for tool developers ==
* [[LibSBGN/Developer Tutorial|Developer Tutorial]] This is a tutorial for developers who want to add LibSBGN support to their tool. * [http://libsbgn.sourceforge.net/docs/ Java API Docs]
= The LibSBGN Development Process =
We're currently defining the [[LibSBGN/Exchange Format|exchange format]]. To see what was discussed in the past, see [[LibSBGN/OnlineMeetings#Past Meetings|OnlineMeetings#Past Meetings]] and the [https://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=sbgn-libsbgn mailing list] hosted in the SBGN SourceForge project
We hold semi-monthly online meetings. For information about past and future meetings, see: [[LibSBGN/OnlineMeetings|OnlineMeetings]]. For the latest information about upcoming meetings, please contact the mailing list. We also have live discussions bi-annually at [http://co.mbine.org/events COMBINE and HARMONY]: * [http://co.mbine.org/events/COMBINE_2012 COMBINE 2012] * [http://www.co.mbine.org/events/HARMONY_2012 HARMONY 2012]
Implementation plan: [[LibSBGN/SBGN-ML_Roadmap|SBGN-ML_Roadmap]]
The development of LibSBGN is articulated around a number of online tools (mostly hosted on SourceForge): * the [https://sourceforge.net/scm/?type=svn&group_id=318225 svn repository] * the [https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=318225&atid=1338219 bug tracker] (See also: [[LibSBGN/Bug Tracker FAQ|bug tracker FAQ]]) * the [https://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=sbgn-libsbgn mailing list]
= Software Support =
LibSBGN is being adopted by a number of tools. For an up-to-date list, see [[LibSBGN/ClientTools|ClientTools]]. To see how these tools render SBGN-ML files, see our [http://libsbgn.sourceforge.net/render_comparison/ render comparison] page.
= Example Files =
Some example files created with LibSBGN can be found here: [[LibSBGN/SBGN-ML Example Files|SBGN-ML Example Files]].
